05E2766D.AffixDesc_Magic: Monster attacks from a distance reduce your Armor by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 25%.

65099C16.AffixDesc_Rare: Monster attacks from a distance reduce your Armor by 6% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

BA17B427.AffixDesc_Legendary: Monster attacks from a distance reduce your Armor by 7% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 35%.
